title: Chloe Sims joins Clelia Theodorou for TOWIE filming
text:
Her close friend Pete Wicks has thrown his support behind her blossoming relationship with French footballer Adil Rami.

And Chloe Sims looked delighted as she returned to filming for The Only Way is Essex on Thursday, joined by the likes of Clelia Theodourou.

The TOWIE star, 36, dressed to impress in a sophisticated, all-black ensemble, teaming a leather shirt with a pair of skinny jeans.

The show must go on: Chloe Sims looked delighted as she returned to filming for The Only Way is Essex on Thursday, joined by the likes of Clelia Theodourou

Chloe highlighted her trim waist with a silver buckle belt and accessorised with oversized hoop earrings.

The reality TV favourite shrugged her coat over her shoulders and rounded off the outfit with a pair of leather boots.

Meanwhile, Clelia showed off her abs in a tiny black bralet and jeans, layering up with a flowing white cardigan.

Dressed to impress: Clelia showed off her abs in a tiny black bralet and jeans, layering up with a flowing white cardigan

Stunning: The TOWIE star, 36, dressed to impress in a sophisticated, all-black ensemble, teaming a leather shirt with a pair of skinny jeansS

Keeping cosy: The reality TV favourite shrugged her coat over her shoulders and rounded off the outfit with a pair of leather boots

Bling: Chloe highlighted her trim waist with a silver buckle belt and accessorised with oversized hoop earrings

She styled her brunette hair down loose and enhanced her cheekbones with a liberal amount of bronzer.

Meanwhile, Pete admitted he feels incredibly protective towards Chloe and is pleased to see her date Pamela Anderson’s ex Adil.

The mother-of-one made headlines a few weeks ago when she was seen leaving London hotspot Chiltern Firehouse in the company of the dashing football star.

Supportive: Pete Wicks admitted he feels incredibly protective towards Chloe and is pleased to see her date Pamela Anderson’s ex Adil Rami

Famous ex: The mother-of-one made headlines a few weeks ago when she was seen leaving London hotspot Chiltern Firehouse in the company of dashing football star Adil (pictured with Pamela in May this year)

Feeling like a protective big brother, Pete said: ‘Chloe deserves to be happy and whatever makes her happy, I’m there for'

Throwing his support behind their unlikely romance, Pete told MailOnline: ‘I wasn’t surprised, I knew she was going on a date. I know she had a good time.

'I think he lives in a different country so I don’t know when they’re planning on seeing each other again.’

Adil parted ways with Pamela this summer following her allegations of 'mental abuse' and accusations of violence and cheating - all of which he has strenuously denied.

Meanwhile, Chloe has had a tough year after her ill-fated romance with co-star Dan Edgar left her heartbroken when he went crawling back to his ex Amber Turner.

Turning things around: Clelia has bounced back from her spat with former best friend Shelby Tribble, who is rumoured to be leaving the show

Natural beauty: She styled her brunette hair down loose and enhanced her cheekbones with a liberal amount of bronzer

Spotted on set: James 'Lockie' Locke was also seen arriving on the filming location

Feeling like a protective big brother, Pete said: ‘Chloe deserves to be happy and whatever makes her happy, I’m there for.

‘I am quite protective over Chloe, she has been messed around a bit and she deserves all the happiness in the world. Hopefully, one day she’ll find her prince charming!’

Chloe and Pete recently had a psychic reading after the blonde became convinced they were soulmates and discovered they had supposedly known each other in their past lives.

But in this lifetime, romance is off the cards – despite the pair looking very cosy during a boozy night out last week.

‘Right now me and Chloe are good friends and that’s the way we like it. If it’s not broke, don’t fix it’, Pete said.

Peace out: TOWIE newcomer Olivia Attwood was dressed down for filming in a red hoodie and sporty tracksuit bottoms
